summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; ratifying and confirming the execution by the Mayor and Comptroller of an agreement and supplement thereto with the State of Washington, Department of Highways, for the allocation of federal funds in aid of the cost of preparation of plans, specifications, cost estimates and related pre-construction engineering work for the City's Stadium and CBD Traffic Control Project; authorizing the Mayor and Comptroller to execute a second supplement to said agreement for the allocation of federal funds for construction costs in connection with said project.
